name: The Adventures of Knight Guy - A school project
name_original: The Adventures of Knight Guy - A school project
description:
-STORY AND DESCRIPTION-

Take control of the iconic 'Knight Guy' on his adventure to obtain a yellow orb.

Use, tools, such as the fire bow and grapple, along with your climbing skills to obtain the orb in the top of the mysterious tower.

This game was made about a year ago as a school project focused on level design, and the deadline was pretty tight. Only few additions, changes and bug-fixes have been made since. There may still be some bugs remaining in the game, and we have no plans of fixing them. (This description is also partially a joke, there is no story in the game :^) )

-CONTROLS-

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Space to jump
  • Left CTRL to Crouch
  • E to interact
  • Right mouse button to aim bow
  • Left mouse button (While aiming) to shoot bow
  • Q to grapple
